Windlord/Kup:::

"What're you talking about, you...?"answer back Windlord

"WINDLORD!! calm down..."said camly Kup"Now, Kitkat, we should clear 
this... First of all, Kitkat, you're not a POW 'cause we are not in 
a conflict with preds, we have a temporal alliance with Preds; 
Second, According with some reports caught by our sencors, you was 
found wounded and almost in stasis in our territory, so the most 
natural thing is that we bring you to CR in order to get do a 
reseach why are you in our territory; Third, is Rodimus who will 
decide what we should do with you: Realease you or not. Now Kitkat I 
would like that you explain me why are you in our territory and why 
was you wounded? "
